item.title: Day 172 - It's the Heart That Matters
item.itunes:title: Day 172 - It's the Heart That Matters
item.description:
Nicky Gumbel is Vicar of Holy Trinity Brompton (HTB), an Anglican church in central London, UK. He is the pioneer of Alpha, an 11-session introduction to the Christian faith, now running all over the world.

The Bible in One Year commentary was introduced in 2011 as a daily email for HTB congregation members. Now, BiOY has a worldwide following with over 3 million users tuning in through the mobile app, iTunes podcast and most recently, the Alexa voice skill.

Nicky has written a number of bestselling books, including "Questions of Life", "The Jesus Lifestyle", "Searching Issues" and "Why Jesus?"

Nicky is married to Pippa. They live in central London and have three grown-up children.

@nickygumbel@pippagumbel

item.title: Day 170 - How to Find Treasures in the Bible
item.itunes:title: Day 170 - How to Find Treasures in the Bible
item.description:
Nicky Gumbel is Vicar of Holy Trinity Brompton (HTB), an Anglican church in central London, UK. He is the pioneer of Alpha, an 11-session introduction to the Christian faith, now running all over the world.

Nicky and Pippa first introduced the Bible in One Year commentary in 2011 as a daily email for HTB congregation members. It has since grown into a mobile app, iTunes podcast and Alexa voice skill with a worldwide following.

Nicky has written a number of bestselling books, including "Questions of Life", "The Jesus Lifestyle", "Searching Issues" and "Why Jesus?"

Nicky is married to Pippa. They live in central London and have three grown-up children.

@nickygumbel@pippagumbel
